name: ドンキーコング64
summary: Donkey Kong 64 is a 1999 adventure platform video game for the Nintendo 64 console, and the first in the Donkey Kong series to feature 3D gameplay. As the gorilla Donkey Kong, the player explores the themed levels of an island to collect items and rescue his kidnapped friends from K. Rool. The player completes minigames and puzzles as five playable Kong characters—each with its own special abilities—to receive bananas and other collectibles. In a separate multiplayer mode, up to four players can compete in deathmatch and last man standing games.
info:
• 中文名: 大金刚64
  • 开发: Rare
  • 发行: 任天堂
  • 别名: Donkey Kong 64
  • 平台: N64
  • 游戏类型: Platform
  • 游玩人数: 本編:1人 対戦:2-4人
  • 发行日期: 1999年11月22日
